name: setDefaultValues
description:
Sets default for contexts of a custom field. Default are defined using these objects:

 *  `CustomFieldContextDefaultValueDate` (type `datepicker`) for date fields.
 *  `CustomFieldContextDefaultValueDateTime` (type `datetimepicker`) for date-time fields.
 *  `CustomFieldContextDefaultValueSingleOption` (type `option.single`) for single choice select lists and radio buttons.
 *  `CustomFieldContextDefaultValueMultipleOption` (type `option.multiple`) for multiple choice select lists and checkboxes.
 *  `CustomFieldContextDefaultValueCascadingOption` (type `option.cascading`) for cascading select lists.
 *  `CustomFieldContextSingleUserPickerDefaults` (type `single.user.select`) for single users.
 *  `CustomFieldContextDefaultValueMultiUserPicker` (type `multi.user.select`) for user lists.
 *  `CustomFieldContextDefaultValueSingleGroupPicker` (type `grouppicker.single`) for single choice group pickers.
 *  `CustomFieldContextDefaultValueMultipleGroupPicker` (type `grouppicker.multiple`) for multiple choice group pickers.
 *  `CustomFieldContextDefaultValueURL` (type `url`) for URLs.
 *  `CustomFieldContextDefaultValueProject` (type `project`) for project pickers.
 *  `CustomFieldContextDefaultValueFloat` (type `float`) for floats (floating-point numbers).
 *  `CustomFieldContextDefaultValueLabels` (type `labels`) for labels.
 *  `CustomFieldContextDefaultValueTextField` (type `textfield`) for text fields.
 *  `CustomFieldContextDefaultValueTextArea` (type `textarea`) for text area fields.
 *  `CustomFieldContextDefaultValueReadOnly` (type `readonly`) for read only (text) fields.
 *  `CustomFieldContextDefaultValueMultipleVersion` (type `version.multiple`) for single choice version pickers.
 *  `CustomFieldContextDefaultValueSingleVersion` (type `version.single`) for multiple choice version pickers.

Forge custom fields [types](https://developer.atlassian.com/platform/forge/manifest-reference/modules/jira-custom-field-type/#data-types) are also supported, returning:

 *  `CustomFieldContextDefaultValueForgeStringFieldBean` (type `forge.string`) for Forge string fields.
 *  `CustomFieldContextDefaultValueForgeMultiStringFieldBean` (type `forge.string.list`) for Forge string collection fields.
 *  `CustomFieldContextDefaultValueForgeObjectFieldBean` (type `forge.object`) for Forge object fields.
 *  `CustomFieldContextDefaultValueForgeDateTimeFieldBean` (type `forge.datetime`) for Forge date-time fields.
 *  `CustomFieldContextDefaultValueForgeGroupFieldBean` (type `forge.group`) for Forge group fields.
 *  `CustomFieldContextDefaultValueForgeMultiGroupFieldBean` (type `forge.group.list`) for Forge group collection fields.
 *  `CustomFieldContextDefaultValueForgeNumberFieldBean` (type `forge.number`) for Forge number fields.
 *  `CustomFieldContextDefaultValueForgeUserFieldBean` (type `forge.user`) for Forge user fields.
 *  `CustomFieldContextDefaultValueForgeMultiUserFieldBean` (type `forge.user.list`) for Forge user collection fields.

Only one type of default object can be included in a request. To remove a default for a context, set the default parameter to `null`.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

fieldId.description: The ID of the custom field.

CustomFieldContextDefaultValueCascadingO.description: The default value for a cascading select custom field.

cascadingOptionId.description: The ID of the default cascading option.

optionId.description: The ID of the default option.

CustomFieldContextDefaultValueMultipleOp.description: The default value for a multi-select custom field.

optionIds.description: The list of IDs of the default options.

items.description: The list of IDs of the default options.

CustomFieldContextDefaultValueSingleOpti.description: The default value for a single select custom field.

optionId.description: The ID of the default option.

CustomFieldContextSingleUserPickerDefaul.description: Defaults for a User Picker (single) custom field.

accountId.description: The ID of the default user.

UserFilter.description: Filter for a User Picker (single) custom field.

groups.description: User groups autocomplete suggestion users must belong to. If not provided, the default values are used. A maximum of 10 groups can be provided.

items.description: User groups autocomplete suggestion users must belong to. If not provided, the default values are used. A maximum of 10 groups can be provided.

roleIds.description: Roles that autocomplete suggestion users must belong to. If not provided, the default values are used. A maximum of 10 roles can be provided.

items.description: Roles that autocomplete suggestion users must belong to. If not provided, the default values are used. A maximum of 10 roles can be provided.

CustomFieldContextDefaultValueMultiUserP.description: The default value for a User Picker (multiple) custom field.

accountIds.description: The IDs of the default users.

items.description: The IDs of the default users.

CustomFieldContextDefaultValueSingleGrou.description: The default value for a group picker custom field.

groupId.description: The ID of the the default group.

CustomFieldContextDefaultValueMultipleGr.description: The default value for a multiple group picker custom field.

groupIds.description: The IDs of the default groups.

items.description: The IDs of the default groups.

CustomFieldContextDefaultValueDate.description: The default value for a Date custom field.

date.description: The default date in ISO format. Ignored if `useCurrent` is true.

useCurrent.description: Whether to use the current date.

CustomFieldContextDefaultValueDateTime.description: The default value for a date time custom field.

dateTime.description: The default date-time in ISO format. Ignored if `useCurrent` is true.

useCurrent.description: Whether to use the current date.

CustomFieldContextDefaultValueURL.description: The default value for a URL custom field.

CustomFieldContextDefaultValueProject.description: The default value for a project custom field.

projectId.description: The ID of the default project.

CustomFieldContextDefaultValueFloat.description: Default value for a float (number) custom field.

CustomFieldContextDefaultValueLabels.description: Default value for a labels custom field.

CustomFieldContextDefaultValueTextField.description: The default text for a text custom field.

text.description: The default text. The maximum length is 254 characters.

CustomFieldContextDefaultValueTextArea.description: The default text for a text area custom field.

text.description: The default text. The maximum length is 32767 characters.

CustomFieldContextDefaultValueReadOnly.description: The default text for a read only custom field.

text.description: The default text. The maximum length is 255 characters.

CustomFieldContextDefaultValueSingleVers.description: The default value for a version picker custom field.

versionId.description: The ID of the default version.

versionOrder.description: The order the pickable versions are displayed in. If not provided, the released-first order is used. Available version orders are `"releasedFirst"` and `"unreleasedFirst"`.

CustomFieldContextDefaultValueMultipleVe.description: The default value for a multiple version picker custom field.

versionIds.description: The IDs of the default versions.

items.description: The IDs of the default versions.

versionOrder.description: The order the pickable versions are displayed in. If not provided, the released-first order is used. Available version orders are `"releasedFirst"` and `"unreleasedFirst"`.

CustomFieldContextDefaultValueForgeStrin.description: The default text for a Forge string custom field.

text.description: The default text. The maximum length is 254 characters.

CustomFieldContextDefaultValueForgeMulti.description: The default text for a Forge collection of strings custom field.

values.description: List of string values. The maximum length for a value is 254 characters.

items.description: List of string values. The maximum length for a value is 254 characters.

CustomFieldContextDefaultValueForgeObjec.description: The default value for a Forge object custom field.

CustomFieldContextDefaultValueForgeDateT.description: The default value for a Forge date time custom field.

dateTime.description: The default date-time in ISO format. Ignored if `useCurrent` is true.

useCurrent.description: Whether to use the current date.

CustomFieldContextDefaultValueForgeGroup.description: The default value for a Forge group custom field.

groupId.description: The ID of the the default group.

CustomFieldContextDefaultValueForgeMulti.description: The default value for a Forge collection of groups custom field.

groupIds.description: The IDs of the default groups.

items.description: The IDs of the default groups.

CustomFieldContextDefaultValueForgeNumbe.description: Default value for a Forge number custom field.

CustomFieldContextDefaultValueForgeUserF.description: Defaults for a Forge user custom field.

accountId.description: The ID of the default user.

CustomFieldContextDefaultValueForgeMulti.description: Defaults for a Forge collection of users custom field.

accountIds.description: The IDs of the default users.

items.description: The IDs of the default users.
